Player History
Injured on 7/27/2002 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Drafted in 3rd round, 73rd overall pick, by Texas in 2004...
Traded from Texas to New York (A) on 1/31/2005 (Going to TEX: C S. Hatteberg. Going to NYY: 1B B. Ramos)...
Traded from New York (A) to Arizona on 6/23/2005 (Going to ARI: 3B M. Macri, 1B B. Ramos. Going to NYY: P J. Fogg)...
Injured on 5/5/2010 with a Bruised Finger, out for 3 days...
Released by Arizona on 7/19/2013...
Drafted in 4th round, 96th overall pick, by Detroit in 2017...
Traded from Detroit to San Diego on 2/25/2020 (Going to SD: P J. Hiles. Going to DET: P R. Baird)...
Drafted in 6th round, 103rd overall pick, by New York (N) in 1978...
Injured on 8/14/1980 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/7/1982, off Mike Krukow (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/27/1982, off Larry Gowell (LA)...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1983...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1987...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 6/16/1990 (Going to NYM: LF M. Young, C J. Owens. Going to CHC: RF C. Smith)...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/2/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $1,200,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/13/1994 to a 1-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
